widget.author: Wansti
widget.description: Watch face in the style of various 8-bit systems, based on the AmbientWatch example from the Tizen SDK. Color palettes included are C64, NES, GameBoy, Atari 2600 and Apple II. The watch face shows time, battery percentage at the top, and the day of month in a binary representation on the bottom. Currently in beta.
widget.name: Press Play On Gear - 8 Bit Watch
